item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 17, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Humans have caused 1.5 °C of long-term global warming according to new estimates (37 points | 22 comments)
2. Everything Is Just Functions: Mind-Blowing Insights from SICP and David Beazley (161 points | 70 comments)
3. AlphaProof's Greatest Hits: the coolest bits from the IMO 2024 solutions (35 points | 7 comments)

5. Voyager 1 Breaks Its Silence with NASA via Radio Transmitter Not Used Since 1981 (29 points | 9 comments)
6. The World Grid and New Geographies of Cooperation (16 points | 3 comments)
7. Bpftune uses BPF to auto-tune Linux systems (152 points | 32 comments)
8. The bucket brigade device: An analog shift register (38 points | 12 comments)
9. All-in-one embedding model for interleaved text, images, and screenshots (192 points | 21 comments)
10. Garak, LLM Vulnerability Scanner (85 points | 23 comments)
11. ML in Go with a Python Sidecar (30 points | discuss)
12. Constraints in Go (122 points | 52 comments)

14. Will passkeys ever replace passwords? Can they? Here's why they should (12 points | 11 comments)
15. Japan ranked 31st in digital competitiveness, 92nd for English skills (25 points | 13 comments)
16. The Bluesky firehose viewed in the style of a Windows XP screensaver (459 points | 121 comments)
17. CSS gets a new logo and it uses the color `rebeccapurple` (668 points | 138 comments)
18. Show HN: Zyme – An Evolvable Programming Language (72 points | 13 comments)
19. Transistor for fuzzy logic hardware: promise for better edge computing (11 points | 1 comment)
20. Battery-Free Bioelectronic Implants (12 points | 4 comments)
21. Memos – An open source Rewinds / Recall (54 points | 10 comments)
22. James Gleick's Chaos: The Software (226 points | 27 comments)
23. The myth that you can’t build interactive web apps except as single page app (115 points | 66 comments)
24. Claude AI built me a React app to compare maps side by side (128 points | 136 comments)
25. A Taxonomy of AgentOps (6 points | discuss)
26. Two Nobel Prize winners want to cancel their own CRISPR patents in Europe (105 points | 83 comments)
27. Lucid dreaming app triples users' awareness in dreams, study finds (6 points | 1 comment)
28. Sentence Structure for Writers (2017) (44 points | 22 comments)
29. How to setup self hosted wiki for your startup (59 points | 22 comments)
30. Teach yourself to echolocate (2018) (209 points | 55 comments)
